input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Assos Equipe RS SS EVO Limited Edition Jersey Blue Steel, XL - Men's'
  - Name='Assos Mille GT Jersey C2 Drop Head'
  - Name='Man Sportful Supernova Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Mapei UCI 30 - Jersey - Man - Print'
  - Name='Man Castelli Superleggera 3 Jersey'
  - Name='Castelli LaMitica Jersey'
  - Name='Castelli Climber's A/C Short Sleeve Jersey Men's'
  - Name='Assos Mille GT Outlaws Supporter Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Squadra Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Jersey'
  - Name='Maap Aerate Pro Air Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Lidl-Trek Jersey Man'
  - Name='Castelli Unlimited Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Rally SS Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Monocrom Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Men's Tactica T5 Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Ombra Eco Micro Polartec Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Drome Pro Air Jersey 3.0'
  - Name='Santini Colorado 1986 UCI Short Sleeve Jersey Man'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Core Cargo Tech T-Shirt'
  - Name='Pro Jersey Men's Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Pro Midweight Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Equipe RS SS EVO Limited Edition Jersey Blue Steel, XL - Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are high-end short sleeve cycling jerseys designed for optimal comfort and performance. Assos Equipe RS EVO is a recognized premium cycling jersey with technical features similar to the reference Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Mille GT Jersey C2 Drop Head
scores_with_rationales.rationale: The Assos Mille GT is a technical cycling jersey with performance fabrics and design suited for intense riding, closely matching the Core Jersey in function and construction.
Sportful Supernova is a lightweight short sleeve cycling jersey designed for comfort and aerodynamics, making it highly relevant to the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Mapei UCI 30 - Jersey - Man - Print
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Santini Mapei UCI 30 is a technical cycling jersey with similar features, though the UCI branding and potential vintage style might slightly differentiate it.
Castelli Superleggera is a high-performance, lightweight cycling jersey similar in purpose and function to the Core Jersey.
Castelli LaMitica is a cycling jersey with technical features, though it may target a slightly different fit or style than the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Climber's A/C Short Sleeve Jersey Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a technical short sleeve cycling jersey designed for climbing with moisture management and light construction, closely aligned to the reference jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Mille GT Outlaws Supporter Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A variation of the Assos Mille GT line, likely with similar materials and function though possibly a limited edition or supporters' version.
A known lightweight performance road cycling jersey, providing similar features and intended use as Pedal Mafia's Core Jersey.
Pearl Izumi's Quest Jersey is a performance cycling jersey with moisture management and comfort features, relevant though possibly mid-tier compared to the Core Jersey.
MAAP Aerate Pro Air is a premium cycling jersey with advanced breathability and fit, matching well the Core Jersey's performance attributes.
Official team jerseys like Lidl-Trek focus more on branding and fan use; still a cycling jersey but less emphasis on technical fabric distinguished in the Core Jersey.
Technical road cycling jersey from Castelli, likely high-quality and function-oriented, similar in nature to Core Jersey.
Assos Rally SS is a short sleeve, performance cycling jersey, very relevant from both use and technical construction standpoint.
Sportful Monocrom is a technical cycling jersey designed for performance riding, relevant though perhaps with a distinct aesthetic or technical focus.
A technical and race-oriented cycling jersey from Assos, with features and construction similar to Pedal Mafia's Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Ombra Eco Micro Polartec Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a thermally focused jersey with Polartec fabric, more suited for warmth than the lightweight, breathable Core Jersey.
A high-end, breathable, and lightweight cycling jersey similar in technical characteristics and intended use to the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Colorado 1986 UCI Short Sleeve Jersey Man
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A race-style jersey commemorating an event or team, similar in concept but possibly less focused on sustainable materials or core technical features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Core Cargo Tech T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Though from the same brand and 'Core' line, this is a tech T-shirt rather than a cycling jersey, differing significantly in construction and intended use.
Generic pro-level cycling jersey; presumably similar in construction and intended function though lacks brand prestige or specific features mentioned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Women's Pro Midweight Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: From the same brand, a midweight women's cycling jersey, likely similar in technical construction and intended use but different fit and thermal properties.
